item.title: Yesheng Liang
item.author: liang2kl@outlook.com (Liang Yesheng)
item.description: I am Yesheng Liang (梁业升), a master student at CSE, UC San Diego. I received my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Technology from Tsinghua University. I like building interesting applications, as well as the lower-level systems that support them. If you’re curious about me beyond academics, feel free to explore the non-academic about page on my blog as well as other posts there (in Chinese). Education University of California, San Diego Master in Computer Science and Engineering
item.content:
I am Yesheng Liang (梁业升), a master student at CSE, UC San Diego. I received my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Technology from Tsinghua University. I like building interesting applications, as well as the lower-level systems that support them.

If you’re curious about me beyond academics, feel free to explore the non-academic about page on my blog as well as other posts there (in Chinese).

Education

University of California, San Diego
Master in Computer Science and Engineering

  • 2024.9 - expected 2026
  • GPA: 4.0/4.0

Tsinghua University
B.Eng. in Computer Science and Technology

  • 2019.8 - 2024.6
  • GPA: 3.75/4.0

Experience

Research Intern
@ Xtra Computing Group, National University of Singapore

  • 2023.8 - 2024.1
  • Language models and prompting
  • Federated learning

Research Intern
@ Storage Research Group, Tsinghua University

  • 2022.1 - 2023.3
  • User-space scheduling in HTAP systems

Research Intern
@ Institute of Trustworthy Networks and Systems, Tsinghua University

  • 2020.9 - 2021.3
  • Indoor positioning with Wi-Fi NICs

Skills

Programming Languages
C/C++, CUDA, Python, Swift, Rust, Go, TypeScript, JavaScript, Bash, SQL, VHDL, SystemVerilog

Frameworks
PyTorch, UIKit, SwiftUI, React, Django, Flask, Gin

Tools
Git, LaTeX, Docker, Make, CMake, Bazel
